subject: MST
name: Museum History and Philosophy
info: Historical and philosophical roots of museums and emerging philosophical issues faced by museums today - from art, history, science, and youth to living collections, living history sites, and historic houses. Field trips to area museums.

subject: MST
name: Museum Practices
info: Practical aspects of museum work. Standards, practices, responsibilities, issues, all set in greater museum context. Curatorial/educational duties, collections management, security, funding, boards, public relations, installation, budgeting.prereq: Grad student or instr consent

subject: MST
name: Internship
info: Students arrange to perform a professional-level task in a museum of good standing under close supervision of a member of the museum's professional staff. Instructor must approve a work plan and report.prereq: 5011, 5012, dept consent

subject: MST
name: Topics in Museum Studies
info: In-depth investigation of specific topic, announced in advance.prereq: grad student

subject: MST
name: Directed Study
info: Study by a student, largely self directed with consultation of a faculty member, on a topic not covered (or not covered in depth) by another course. Program of study is determined jointly by student and advising faculty member.prereq: [5012 or concurrent registration is required (or allowed) in  5012], instr consent, dept consent
